description.en:
SALARY is a project designed to be the path to the financial freedom 
SALARY was built with purpose to build the best-dcentralized technology available to the world while building mass adoption of cryptocurrency and making an equal impact on humanity at the same time.
SALARY is a deflationary project designed with a goal to give investors holders Passive Income every day 
Holders of SLR will earn 
 7% reward of every buy/sell transaction in USDT 
7% reward of every buy/sell transaction in BNB
7 % reward of every buy/sell transaction in ETH
Which makes it 21% in rewards for SLR holders of every transaction.
